name: UITableViewFocusUpdateContext
desc: A context object that provides information relevant to a specific focus update from one view to another.

items.name: var previouslyFocusedIndexPath: IndexPath?
items.desc: Returns the index path of the cell containing the context’s previously focused view.

items.name: var nextFocusedIndexPath: IndexPath?
items.desc: Returns the index path of the cell containing the context’s next focused view.
